location.description:
We offer professional buyout services with free equipment pickup from any location in Florida—no need for you to leave your home. In Miami, Fort Lauderdale, Hialeah, and Hollywood, you can sell your tools and receive cash on the spot within 1–2 hours.

For clients in other areas of Florida, our appraisers arrive within:

South Florida (2–4 hours): West Palm Beach, Hollywood, Boca Raton, Coral Springs, Pembroke Pines, Miramar, Miami Gardens, Homestead, Aventura, and surrounding regions.

Central Florida (4–6 hours): Orlando, Tampa, St. Petersburg, Clearwater, Lakeland, Daytona Beach, Ocala, The Villages, and surrounding communities.

North Florida (6–8 hours): Jacksonville, Tallahassee, Gainesville, Pensacola, Panama City, Lake City, St. Augustine, and nearby areas.

list.title: We purchase tools and equipment in any condition — from brand new to heavily used.
Service available throughout all of Florida — from Key West to Jacksonville.
All shipping costs are covered by us, even from out-of-state locations.
We handle challenging cases — tools on financing, broken equipment, missing parts, or damaged items.
Free expert appraisal and comprehensive functionality testing provided.
We cover all transportation fees, regardless of your location in the country.
No pressure, no manipulation — the final decision always remains with you.

listAsq.title: How can I sell my used tools for cash today?
listAsq.content: Selling your tools today is incredibly simple! Just message us through your preferred platform and attach photos of your tools or equipment. Our appraiser will immediately provide you with our cash for tools offer. The decision is then entirely yours! If you agree, we'll come to your location right away. If you prefer to visit our store instead, we'd be delighted to see you in person!

listAsq.title: Who buys tools and equipment near me?
listAsq.content: Buddy Cash is Florida's premier tool buying service. We're prepared to offer competitive prices for virtually anything you have at home. We specialize in purchasing construction tools and equipment of all kinds. Our experts understand the nuances and value of each type of tool, ensuring you get the best deal when you sell tools in Florida.

listAsq.title: What types of tools do you accept?
listAsq.content: We consider purchasing all types of tools including: cordless power tools, power tool batteries and chargers, complete power tool sets, heavy-duty and wired power tools, air tools and compressors, hand tools, electrician's tools, automotive tools, welding equipment, and saws. Whatever tools you have, we're interested in making you an offer when you want to sell tools and equipment.

listAsq.title: How can I get my tools appraised online?
listAsq.content: We value every client's time, which is why we've created a convenient online appraisal process that eliminates the need to visit our office. Simply send photos of your tools through your preferred messaging platform (Facebook Messenger, Instagram, WhatsApp, SMS, or email). Within just 10 minutes, we'll respond with our purchase offer. If you accept, you can immediately schedule our specialist to come to your home to complete the sale and provide cash for tools and equipment.

listAsq.title: How quickly will I receive payment?
listAsq.content: After our expert tests your tools to verify functionality, we immediately shake hands and pay you in cash. We also offer payment options including bank transfers or checks for your convenience. When you sell tools and equipment to us, you get paid the same day!

listAsq.title: Tool Buyers in Florida
listAsq.content:
There are many tool buyers available online today, including:
  • Local pawn shops (significantly undervalue your tools, selling for practically nothing)
  • Facebook Marketplace (one of the better options, but requires considerable time for listing and dealing with strangers)
  • Offer apps (90% of users are resellers looking for extremely low prices)
  • eBay (high commission fees and frequent buyer returns)


The choice is yours! While we may not always offer the absolute highest price when you want cash for tools, we provide premium service and the fastest selling experience possible for those looking to sell tools in Florida.
